Is there anything missing from the produ: As someone who values financial security, I would like to see a higher FDIC insurance limit than $250,000. While this is certainly a good amount, it may not be enough for those with larger savings goals. Overall though, I think the product has a lot of great features and would definitely consider using it.

What factors are most important to you w: When choosing where to open a deposit account, the most important factors to me are competitive interest rates, flexible terms, and easy online access. What are some concerns you have about op: As someone who is considering opening a deposit account with your credit union, my main concern would be around the level of customer service and support that I can expect to receive.
